attributes.action: prevent ticket agents charging excessive administration fees on top of ticket prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently purchased 5 concert tickets for me and my friends. On top of the £22.50 ticket fee I was charged £2.25 per ticket for administration fees. This would be almost acceptable if it was not for the fact that the tickets were sent, almost instantly, to me via reply e-mail. I am no technical expert but I would suggest that this was done by a computer program and cost the ticketing company next to nothing.
